trans-unit.source: Direct access to DSC resource methods
trans-unit.target: 直接存取 DSC 資源方法

trans-unit.source: The `Invoke-DscResource` cmdlet has been added to allow direct access to DSC resources and there methods (Get, Set or Test).
trans-unit.target: `Invoke-DscResource` Cmdlet 已經加入，以允許直接存取 DSC 資源以及它們的方法 (Get、Set 或 Test)。

trans-unit.source: It can be used by third-parties that want to take advantage of DSC resources.
trans-unit.target: 它可供想要充分利用的 DSC 資源的協力廠商使用。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is typically used in combination with `refreshMode = ‘Disabled’` but can be used no matter what refreshMode is set to.
trans-unit.target: 這個 Cmdlet 通常用於搭配 `refreshMode = ‘Disabled’`，但可用於任何 refreshMode 設定。

trans-unit.source: Below are some examples of how to use the new cmdlet:
trans-unit.target: 以下是如何使用新 Cmdlet 的一些範例︰

trans-unit.source: Test that a file is present
